nodes.text: Thoma was a Human male Padawan who served the Jedi Order during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. Stationed on Nar Shaddaa, he went on a mission to investigate alien mercenaries that have trained themselves to join the Empire. While investigating inside the Mercenary Training Facility Barracks, his mission ended in failure when he was killed by the Imperial mercenaries.
